bio: Ah, greetings, traveler! I am Hokdulf the Long-Sighted, a humble jewelry merchant who roams the storied roads of Skyrim. My name? Ah, it's quite the tale. Many years ago, I was but a wide-eyed lad, brimming with dreams of adventure. One fateful day, I embarked on a perilous journey to the peaks of High Hrothgar, seeking wisdom from the Greybeards. Yet, a treacherous snowstorm nearly claimed my life, freezing me in my tracks. As I huddled in the icy wilderness, shivering and near despair, a wise old mage named Anselm found me. He bestowed upon me a magical amulet, which he claimed would grant me the ability to see into the future. From that day forward, I became Hokdulf the Long-Sighted, using my newfound insight to craft exquisite jewelry that carries the spark of destiny. So, dear traveler, every piece you see before you holds a touch of that mystical amulet's power, and each gem tells a story of past, present, and future. Would you care to discover your own destiny among my wares?
name: Hokdulf the Long-Sighted
